data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of recommended travel destinations based on specified criteria. Accepts parameters to filter recommendations (e.g., location, travel preferences). Returns an array of recommended locations with details including location identifiers, names, and relevance information. Use this operation to discover travel recommendations for end-users or to populate destination suggestion features.
